title: The Big Suey: Journalism With A Side Of Fart Jokes
description:
We begin The Big Suey with one of the greatest NBA flops of all-time and whether or not Draymond Green punched Jordan Poole just for a documentary. Then, Kanye West's hate speech sparks a conversation on free speech, democracy, editorial decisions, censorship, and more. We discuss the lines blurring between journalism and entertainment and where the line is on who should determine who has a platform.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
